modShortDescription: Try the Butcher Mod added over 300 new food items to the 7 Days to Die. You now have 19 new kinds of vegetables and fruits that spawn as seeds and live plants.
modDescription:
Try the Butcher Mod added over 300 new food items to the 7 Days to Die. You now have 19 new kinds of vegetables and fruits that spawn as seeds and live plants in the world. nioton6 re-added the old way of farming so we can farm without having to make a plot! Moreover, all image files are 1080p! In addition you can now get animal meat that will vary from animal to animal; this includes two categories large and small.

* **Small:** Snake, Chicken, Rabbit.
* **Large:** Mountain lion, bear, coyote, wolf, dire-wolf, boar.

## Item List

All items in the mod:

### Default

* Large Animal Meat
* Small Animal Meat
* Raw Animal Leg
* Raw Ribs (Only Boars)
* Raw Hunk Of Meat
* Raw Intestines
* Raw Ground Meat
* Raw Steak
* Raw Bacon
* Cooking Oil
* Pure Animal Milk (Currently Only Doe)
* Grilled Ribs
* Charred Ribs
* Smoked Ribs
* Ground Meat
* Hot-Dog Link
* Sausage
* Grilled Steak
* Grilled Burger
* Smoked Brisket
* Grilled Bacon
* Fried Steak
* Animal Cheese
* Mutton
* Scrambled Eggs (From Snake And Chicken)
* Boar Soup
* Chicken Soup
* Rabbit Soup
* Snake Soup
* Cream Of Meat (For All Large Animals)
* Bear Skin
* Boar Skin
* Coyote Skin
* Deer Skin (Doe And Stag)
* Wolf Skin
* Dire-Wolf Skin
* Lion Skin
* Raw Snake Eggs
* Boiled Snake Eggs
* Raw Snake Meat
* Grilled Snake
* Snake Skin
* Snake Jerky
* Raw Chicken Breast
* Grilled Chicken Breast
* Chicken Jerky
* Raw Chicken Leg
* Grilled Chicken Leg
* Raw Chicken Wings
* Grilled Chicken Wings
* Chicken Tenders
* Raw Rabbit Body
* Grilled Rabbit
* Charred Rabbit
* Rabbit Jerky
* Rabbit Skin

### Nonmeat

* Salt
* Charcoal
* Flour

### Vegetables

* Tomatoes
* Onions
* Garlic
* Beets
* Carrots
* Green Bell Peppers
* Wheat
* Lettuce

### Fruits

* Grapes
* Lime
* Lemon
* Orange
* Apple
* Cherry

### Tools

* Cleaver
* Knife
* Grinder

### Delicatessen Update

* Pastrami (Cut/Uncut with table saw)
* Ham (Cut/Uncut with table saw)
* Chicken (Cut/Uncut with table saw)
* Angus (Cut/Uncut with table saw)

### Cooking

* Dough (Makes All Breads Universal)
* Taco Shell
* Hotdog Bun
* Burger Bun
* Flat Bread
* Baguette

### Tacos

* Egg and Cheese
* Ham and Tomato
* Angus
* Fried Chicken Burrito

### Grinders

* Chicken
* Angus
* Ham
* Blt
* Fried Chicken

### Burgers

* Plain
* Loaded
* Bacon
* Extra Cheese

### Alcohol

* Gin
* Burban
* Whiskey
* Absinthe
* Wine
* Gin
* Rum
* High Quality Beer

### Juices

* Lemonade
* Orange Juice
* Grape Juice
* Apple Juice

**Reminder:** All animals will contain unique items and it varies throughout the progression.
